Name: SignBoard
Notes: A generic signboard that acts like an NPC, meaning that the player can read it or talk to it.

Obj_arg0.Name: 2P Mode Type
Obj_arg0.Description: If set to 0, the object will be hidden during singleplayer. During 2P mode, the object will pop up.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated. If used along with Obj_arg0, the object will appear if this switch is activated and if 2P mode is active.

SW_A.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_B.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: Can be registered to a Starship Mario object appearance event.

Message.Description: The text message ID to be used. Needs to be specified in the zone's text file.
